query:
WITH 
                account_info AS (
                        SELECT index AS account_index, amount AS current_balance
                        FROM accounts
                        WHERE canonical_address = $1
                )
                INSERT INTO account_statements (
                    account_index,
                    entry_type,
                    amount,
                    block_height,
                    transaction_id,
                    account_balance,
                    slot_time
                )
                SELECT
                    account_index,
                    $2,
                    $3,
                    $4,
                    $5,
                    current_balance,
                    (SELECT slot_time FROM blocks WHERE height = $4)
                FROM account_info
